actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, for purposes of entitling veterans to 45 months of educational assistance for all educational programs under chapter 34 of such title and to eliminate the 10-year time limitation within which educational assistance must be used.

summary.text: Increases from 36 to 45 months the period of entitlement for educational assistance for eligible veterans. Eliminates the ten-year time limitation within which such assistance must be used. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1661; 1662).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, for purposes of entitling veterans to 45 months of educational assistance for all educational programs under chapter 34 of such title and to eliminate the 10-year time limitation within which educational assistance must be used.
